long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You ever google that funny video you saw on twitter on month ago, only to find a bunch of lame ass news sites with clunky video players and shitty ads? Well we have a solution for you! Video it takes whatever you would search for on Google Videos, and sends it to you YouTube instead. That way you never have to waste your time on your local news site again. Cheers!
